name: autoscrape-www
description: Frontend web UI for running AutoScrape and extracting data.

scripts.build-hextractor: git submodule init && git submodule update && cd public/hextractor && npm install && npm run build-prod
scripts.download-hextractor: wget https://github.com/brandonrobertz/hextractor/raw/master/hextractor.html -P public/hextractor/ && wget https://github.com/brandonrobertz/hextractor/raw/master/hext-emscripten.js -P public/ && wget https://github.com/brandonrobertz/hextractor/raw/master/hext-emscripten.wasm -P public/
scripts.build-dev: wget public/hextractor npm run build-hextractor && cp -f public/hextractor/hext-emscripten.* ./public/ && react-scripts build

author: Brandon Roberts
